name: evocation
notes:
this is part 3 of the arcanoweave doily!  the pattern continues where part 2 left off, starting on round 20 and ending with round 41.  

here are the links to parts 1, 2, 4 and 5-
part 1 arcane aura- https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/arcane-aura
part 2 incanter's insight- https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/incanters-insight
part 4 innervision-
https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/innervision
part 5 terrace of the magi-
https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/terrace-of-the-magi

**materials needed**

* size 10 crochet thread, 300-325 yards
* 1.75 mm hook
* yarn needle
* scissors

**finished size**

* about 14" in diameter

the thread iâ€™m using is aunt lydias size 10 cotton crochet thread in the colors purple and wood violet.
